text: void recurse ( int arr [ ] , int first , int n ) { if ( arr [ first ] < arr [ first + 1 ] ) arr [ first + 1 ] = arr [ first ] ; static int k ; if ( first == 0 ) k = 0 ; k += arr [ first + 1 ] ; if ( first < n - 1 ) { recurse ( arr , first + 1 , n ) ; } else { printf ( "%d\n" , k ) ; } } int main ( ) { int n , arr [ 100001 ] , i , a ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < a ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] ) ; recurse ( arr , 0 , i - 1 ) ; } return 0 ; }
